lunch-money-buddy.title: Lunch Money Buddy
lunch-money-buddy.subtitle: Interaction Design & Prototyping
lunch-money-buddy.summary: During my interaction design class at KSU, I designed the user interface for a fictitious mobile app called Lunch Money Buddy, which helps parents or guardians of schoolchildren manage the kids' lunch money.
lunch-money-buddy.feature-image-alt: Screenshots from the Lunch Money Buddy interactive prototype
